mapper.select: /** * Query ID : transferTargetNameCheck * Description : 커넥트명 중복 체크 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I WHERE TRF_TRG_CNN_NM=#{trf_trg_cnn_nm}

/** * Query ID : selectTransfermappid * Description : TRF_TRG_MPP_ID 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT B.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I A,T_TRFTRGMPP_R B WHERE A.TRF_TRG_ID = B.TRF_TRG_ID AND A.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM=#{trf_trg_cnn_nm}
mapper.delete: /** * Query ID : deleteTransferTarget * Description : 전송대상 삭제 * Author : 김주영 **/ DELETE FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I WHERE TRF_TRG_CNN_NM=#{trf_trg_cnn_nm}
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectTransferDetail * Description : 전송상세설정 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT TMP.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM , TMP.TRF_TRG_ID , TMP.DB_NM , TMP.DB_SVR_NM , TMP.BW_PID , TMP.DB_ID FROM ( SELECT TD.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM,TD.TRF_TRG_ID,(CASE WHEN TD.DB_NM IS NOT NULL THEN TD.DB_NM ELSE '' END) AS DB_NM,S.DB_SVR_NM,TD.BW_PID,TD.DB_ID FROM (SELECT T.*,D.DB_SVR_ID,D.DB_NM FROM (SELECT SI.*, MR.DB_ID FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I SI LEFT OUTER JOIN T_TRFTRGMPP_R MR ON SI.TRF_TRG_ID = MR.TRF_TRG_ID ) AS T LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DB_I D ON T.DB_ID=D.DB_ID ) AS TD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DBSVR_I S ON TD.DB_SVR_ID = S.DB_SVR_ID WHERE TD.CNR_ID=#{cnr_id} AND TD.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM LIKE #{trf_trg_cnn_nm} ) TMP WHERE TMP.DB_NM LIKE #{db_nm}

/** * Query ID : selectServerDbList * Description : 데이터베이스 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT S.DB_SVR_ID , S.DB_SVR_NM , I.DB_ID,I.DB_NM FROM T_DBSVR_I S , T_DB_I I WHERE S.DB_SVR_ID=I.DB_SVR_ID AND S.DB_SVR_NM = #{db_svr_nm}

/** * Query ID : selectServerDb * Description : DB,SERVER 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT D.db_id , D.db_nm , S.db_svr_id , S.db_svr_nm , S.ipadr , S.portno , S.dft_db_nm , S.svr_spr_usr_id , S.svr_spr_scm_pwd FROM T_DB_I D , T_DBSVR_I S WHERE D.db_svr_id=S.db_svr_id AND D.db_id=#{db_id} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: /** * Query ID : insertTransferRelation * Description : 전송대상매핑관계 등록 * Author : 김주영 **/ INSERT INTO T_TRFTRGMPP_R ( TRF_TRG_MPP_ID , TRF_TRG_ID , DB_ID , CNR_ID , FRST_REGR_ID , FRST_REG_DTM , LST_MDFR_ID , LST_MDF_DTM ) VALUES ( nextval('q_trftrgmpp_r_01') , #{trf_trg_id} , #{db_id} , #{cnr_id} , #{frst_regr_id} , clock_timestamp() , #{lst_mdfr_id} , clock_timestamp() )
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectTransferMapping * Description : 전송매핑테이블내역 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT I.TRF_TRG_ID , R.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID , L.TRF_TB_ID , I.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM , L.SCM_NM , L.TB_ENGL_NM , D.DB_ID , D.DB_NM , S.DB_SVR_NM FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I I , T_TRFTRGMPP_R R , T_TRFMPPTB_L L , T_DB_I D , T_DBSVR_I S WHERE I.TRF_TRG_ID=R.TRF_TRG_ID AND R.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID=L.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID AND R.DB_ID =D.DB_ID AND D.DB_SVR_ID =S.DB_SVR_ID AND I.TRF_TRG_ID =#{trf_trg_id}
mapper.delete: /** * Query ID : deleteTransferRelation * Description : 전송대상매핑관계 삭제 * Author : 김주영 **/ DELETE FROM T_TRFTRGMPP_R WHERE TRF_TRG_MPP_ID =#{trf_trg_mpp_id}
/** * Query ID : deleteTransferMapping * Description : 전송매핑테이블내역 삭제 * Author : 김주영 **/ DELETE FROM T_TRFMPPTB_L WHERE TRF_TRG_MPP_ID =#{trf_trg_mpp_id}
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : updateBottleWaterBwpid * Description : Bottlewater DB정보 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT S.DFT_DB_NM , S.IPADR , S.PORTNO , S.SVR_SPR_USR_ID , S.SVR_SPR_SCM_PWD , A.DB_ID , A.SCM_NM , A.TB_ENGL_NM , (SELECT TRF_TRG_CNN_NM FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I WHERE TRF_TRG_ID= #{trf_trg_id}) AS TRF_TRG_CNN_NM FROM ( SELECT R.DB_ID,R.CNR_ID,L.SCM_NM,L.TB_ENGL_NM FROM T_TRFTRGMPP_R R,T_TRFMPPTB_L L WHERE R.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID = L.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID AND R.TRF_TRG_ID = #{trf_trg_id} )A, T_DB_I I, T_DBSVR_I S WHERE I.DB_SVR_ID=S.DB_SVR_ID AND A.DB_ID=I.DB_ID
